title: Looking Ahead To Jobs Day
itunes:title: Looking Ahead To Jobs Day
description:
David Riley, Chief Investment Strategist at BlueBay Asset Management, previews jobs day. Rebecca Ray, Executive Vice President, Human Capital at The Conference Board, discusses their return to work study. Brian Fields, Groupon’s Chief Commercial Officer, talks trending stay-cation experiences for Labor Day weekend. Aleem Remtula, Partner and Co-Head of the Private Equity Group at Developing World Markets, discusses what refugees from Afghanistan will face financially in other countries. Hosted by Paul Sweeney and Matt Miller.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
